title: Review: Satechi’s compact Pro Hub Mini brings even more I/O to your MacBook Pro
content:
While the latest MacBook Pro notebooks bring back a range of I/O, they’re still missing Ethernet and USB-A ports. Satechi’s delivers those and more in a compact design without sacrificing access to MagSafe or your USB-C ports.

more…

The post Review: Satechi’s compact Pro Hub Mini brings even more I/O to your MacBook Pro appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The Satechi Pro Hub Mini is a compact USB-C adapter that offers all the essential I/O missing from the 14 and 16-inch MacBook Pro.
